TextView.android:text: Zungvi is a 100% congolese developed social network. Accessible on the web and Android through it app, it gives every user with a unique account the possibility to meet in forums and virtual places in order share knowledge and ideas in the areas of their choice... Each user who is a member of the forum has the opportunity to ask a question, or submit a topic to the members of the forum, who can then give their opinions on the topic posted by that user while respecting their privacy and security.Users can create customized Forum and virtual places where they can share and discuss on different topics of their choices. Direct messaging allows for people to have one on one private discussions in a private and secure way. Users can share text files, images, quote, link, etc, across the network. Nominated as the best solution in the Learning and Education category by the WSA DRC expert. Privacy and security of the user is ensured.
